subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea closed the gap on Arsenal at the top of the English Premier League on Saturday by beating Tottenham Hotspur, 2-0, as Arsenal was held to a 1-1 draw by Birmingham City. Arsenal leads with 51 points from 22 games, followed by United with 48 from 21 and Chelsea with 47 from 22.
